sentence: Israeli  soldiers  have  been  killed  in  airstrikes  by  Israeli  planes  and  by  shrapnel  from  their  own  explosives.

Nearly  a  fifth  of  Israeli  fatalities  since  the  invasion  of  Gaza  in  late  October  were  caused  by  friendly  fire  or  accidents,  accounting  for  36  of  the  188  soldiers  killed  at  the  time  of  the  report.
And  as  we  saw,  you  definitely  might  have  cases  of  shooting  and  killing  hostages,"  he  said.

These  incidents,  along  with  the  shooting  of  three  hostages  by  Israeli  soldiers  —  and  the  more  than  25,000  Palestinians  killed  in  Gaza  —  have  raised  questions  about  how  Israel  is  conducting  its  war  tactically  and  strategically.

And  as  more  Israelis  grow  frustrated  with  the  lack  of  results  from  the  military  invasion  of  Gaza,  with  at  least  100  hostages  remaining  and  210  soldiers  killed  overall,  Avner  Gvaryahu  says  Israel's  leaders  need  to  learn  some  lessons  here.
